title: HEY RIOT NOT FAIR!!!
body: LOL clients crashed during champ select and once I reboot and log in I receive a penalty for "leaving a game during champion select", not cool I don't like being punished for something out of my control.......maybe you guys need to put your heads together and come up with something that can differentiate between genuine leavers and client crashes!

replies.body:
While I agree that it is annoying af (literally just happened to me), the time penalties aren't that long unless you are dodging a lot. 

Like profflippynips said, just take the time to do other things while you wait it out. 

If this issue is happening to you a lot (and your dodge timers are stacking up), I would suggest checking the [bugsplat and gamecrash fixes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for what could be the issue.

You sound tilted.

I've had that happen to me. While it is frustrating, take 5 minutes to read the Riot news, or browse the store then come back. it's not something that is going to need a client fix.
I sometimes get a black screen when champ select starts up and I can do nothing but restart lol so I get time penalty its so annoying
